title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-5.6 - Retail food stores without equipment and utensil cleaning facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-5.6 - Retail food stores without equipment and utensil cleaning facilities

State Regulations

Retail food stores that do not have facilities for proper
cleaning and sanitizing of utensils and equipment shall not prepare or package
food or dispense unpackaged food other than raw fruits and raw
vegetables. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-5.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
